description:
A time tracker and timesheet app that lets you track work hours across projects.


- Improvement: Migrated to a unified local database system for better performance and data reliability.
- Auto Tracker: Optimized URL tracking for Chrome and Edge browsers.
- Improvement: Pomodoro break entries are now persistent.
- Fix: Resolved a crash that occured when the PC wakes up from sleep.
- Fix: Fixed an issue where screenshots were occasionally not being captured.
- Fix: Fixed an issue where 'No internet connection' banner appeared while the device was online.
- General: Performance and stability improvements.
